title: Nice bug Riot
body:
Yesterday i was playing a ranked,the game just started and I decide to put the verticalsync off on the option menu, when i press the ok button the game freeze, i tried to alt+tab , ctrl+alt+canc or alt+f4 but nothing, i needed to restart my computer,after that i tried to reconnect but the game freezez at 100% on the loading screen,i couldn't get into the game and i need to restart my pc again;at this point i decided to unistall and reinstall lol, so this morning i tried to get again in a normal game,but i have the sameproble and all is freezed at 100% in the loading screen :(.

Can someone help me?{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Are you running Windows 10? I've been seeing an increasing number of reported issues after updating to the new anniversary updates that rolled out a few days ago. If you are on Windows 10, I recommend [rolling back](http://www.howtogeek.com/235474/how-to-roll-back-builds-and-uninstall-updates-on-windows-10/) or uninstalling any recent updates from the last week or so.

If you're not on 10, let me know.
